title: HELP ME PLZ
body:
So while i was playing league of legends, i had my email account deleted because it got hacked so,  i went to change my email in league. It asked to go back to my previous email to receive a notification of change. I cant do this and it disappoints me as i can't be notified with any important/ news feed/ information in league  due to not being able to change my email. 
please help me change my email
regards: Shadowspirt
